programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Scare Bud / All Harvey'S Eve - There's an uninvited guest at the Bow's house: a not-so-scary ghost named Casper. On Halloween, Lotta tries to win a spooky storytelling contest.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep50
programme.desc: Big Silly / Smek Chills Out - Smudge tries to prove to Fox and Stick that his monster friend is real/Julio teaches Smek how to "chill out" but Smek takes it too far

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House Of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep2
programme.desc: Surprise - Cleo tries to find her place at the Academy, unaware that Akila is planning a surprise birthday party for her.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep25
programme.desc: I Knew That Was Gonna Happen/Sacagawea - After hearing a prediction that the world will end during the show, Sherman panics and Peabody must take control of the apocalypse situation

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep24
programme.desc: A Time To Skrill - When the Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless, the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert And The Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert And The Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special – an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep83
programme.desc: Fifi'S Pancake Fun - Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip'S Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.desc: Rupert And The Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert And The Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep85

programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Marcia Hines is an Australian music icon. She arrived in Australia, from Boston, as a 16-year-old to perform in the musical Hair and then made Australia her home. How will Anh capture her independence and bravery?

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In this visually stunning series, Aaron Pedersen and Holly Ringland guide us through our land's unique stories. They visit Springbrook National Park on Yugambeh Country in Qld, inviting us to deepen our connection to nature.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep225
programme.desc: Greg Jennett brings you a daily dose of politics and national affairs live from Parliament House in Canberra. Stay in touch with the latest news and interviews with key players on the issues making headlines. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep45
programme.desc: Your one stop shop for a wrap-up of the week in politics with some of the sharpest minds in the parliamentary press gallery. Greg Jennett and the panel discuss the big stories that dominated the news cycle. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep240
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Drum Ep225
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep240
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Lorna Dunkley presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: Ticket To Qatar Ep6
programme.desc: Some Messi magic sees Argentina end the Socceroos' run at the World Cup. What next for Australian football? Plus France and England to meet in a Quarter Final as the action continues in Qatar. Tracey Holmes has the latest.

programme.title: ABC News Ep294
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News QLD brings you today's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter. Presented by Jessica van Vonderen.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Conquering her fear of bees, Analiese gets her first beehive, before heading off on an adventure of foraging, fishing and diving with best friend and famous Thai restaurateur, Palisa Anderson in pristine Satellite Island.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep6
